title: Surviving Garen's Ult with the tiniest sliver of health

replies.body:
Got stabbed with a giant sword?

Eat an orange and it will be K. 

Shot with a giant ice arrow? Eat an orange and you won't even feel the cold.

Got a heatstroke after taking a fireball to the face? Orange will cool you down and heal the burns.


Turned to stone? Cleaved with an axe? Blinded by some poison? Impaled?Buried in a frozen tomb? Put to sleep? Bound by magic? Accidentally stepped on a beartrap? Even eaten by some giant catfish demon?


Eat an orange and it will all be K, you´ll be healthy enough to walk right away.

Just dont get hit by something else right away before you can finish chewing on the orange you already stuffed into your mouth, overdosing won't help.
no need to regurgitate over used memes in the league community
There is _always_ a need to regurgitate overused memes. That's what makes them memes! {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

Technically that's a "Dank" meme.
The more you know.
And I suppose you're the type of guy that still thinks NB3 is comedy gold?

this guy mad that some one is challenger
makes a ton of money off youtube and twitch 
and is over all a better person because he makes a lot of people laugh
Wait, you actually think that NB3 is comedic? NotLikeThis

does it matter if I do or not?
I actually do watch his channel. while yes some of his jokes are dumb he is rather skilled and doesn't play a small pool of champions. so yes I watch NB3, both to learn and laugh

even if I didn't like him, I would still have to admit he has a lot of fans, why would I bash on him? he does what he likes and clearly lots of other people do as well. that's something to aspire to, not bash on
He uses clickbait (along with almost every other youtuber) and he continually spouts dead memes.
and? lots of people like dead memes still, and his "click bait" is actually don't, 1k ap cho, guess what? he does it

I do not like nb3 at all actually 

I supposed you’re the type of guy that thinks overused dumb shit like this is comedy gold?
It's a meme that has been around so long it's worthy of being a classic {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Eat an Orange, you'll feel better

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=js1IMnOA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-23T22:07:33.221+0000)
>
> Got stabbed with a giant sword?
> 
> Eat an orange and it will be K. 
> 
> Shot with a giant ice arrow? Eat an orange and you won't even feel the cold.
> 
> Got a heatstroke after taking a fireball to the face? Orange will cool you down and heal the burns.
> 
> 
> Turned to stone? Cleaved with an axe? Blinded by some poison? Impaled?Buried in a frozen tomb? Put to sleep? Bound by magic? Accidentally stepped on a beartrap? Even eaten by some giant catfish demon?
> 
> 
> Eat an orange and it will all be K, you´ll be healthy enough to walk right away.
> 
> Just dont get hit by something else right away before you can finish chewing on the orange you already stuffed into your mouth, overdosing won't help.

got hit by a {{champion:157}}  q-nado?  ~~eat an orange and it'll be K~~

It cuts too deep due it's extremely sharp ~~edginess~~ wind, Orange isn't enough to cure that kind of ~~mental~~ damage. 


One truly goes insane after hearing hasaki  for the 100th time.
That damned orange , it's so good

Wana know how GP survived MF bombing his ship to pieces, blowing off his arm and scorching him in general?

......


He had filled the hull of his flagship with oranges and orange juice so that when the ship exploded he was sent flying up before crashing down into a healing pool {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  


So he easily endured the pain and misery of having his arm blown off, his body burned and who knows damaged in what other ways.

He just swam back to shore with his remaining arm, grabbed some magic metal arm, put it on and started working on getting his gang back together.


Lesson to be learned? Oranges are solution to all the health related issue´s a pirate might face, as long as you survive to eat the fruit and drink the juice you´ll be perfectly k c.
That is the face of "Fucking really? That's it? Like, I expected more."
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/874/293/011.gif
I just imagine dante as an adc, who now is looking at the garen with {{item:3153}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}} and smiling.

You clearly have not played any marksman nearly enough if you think that alone will save a marksman from a Garen who got close enough to do his combo and ulti x)

(Provided they aren't too far apart in gold and levels)
he just survived garent ult so now he's gonna kite.

What marksman can possibly hope to survive the combo and still run away? O_O

Only one i can think of is Vayne, anyone else that get's caught in melee range dies.

Cait does not get away, Garen´s W+Q let's him catch up pretty easily if she started her E when he already got in ulti range.

Corki is much the same, without package he won´t get away.

Draven....might get away, but it would be hard with Garen already in melee range.

Ez could if he jumps over a wall, otherwise he get's caught.

Graves does not get away.


Lucian does if he has ghostblade....i think.

Quinn does not if garen already reached melee range.

Trist does.

Garen get's a boatload of tenacity from his W, so stacking it+merc boots+resolve or precision tenacity let's him virtually ignore anything like varus or Ashe R.

They seriously last less than 0,5 seconds, someone tested stacking max tenacity and a full 3 seconds Ashe ulti lasted less than 0,3- 


Which is why no champ relying on CC can hope to kite a garen when he has some levels and a couple of items, so Ashe, Xayah and Varus are instantly out.


If max range Ashe ulti can barely stun him then nothing else can.
Someone clearly has never fought against a decent Quinn as Garen.

The entire premise here was that Garen already gapclosed, did his combo and chunked quinn down to like 5% health.

Do you really think a quinn can hope to get away after that? x)

First off, we're under the assumption that Garen has used his full combo leading up to his ultimate (as was said by you in the post). If he simply used his ultimate and nothing else you might have a case for most of your arguments.

Cait still gets away because now she has room to lay down a trap immediately after using net to back off (which is almost Garen-teed to hit Garen). Garen cannot just refresh his Q cooldown to get back on top of her and even then he still has to avoid the fresh trap while being slowed.

Draven would not only need to use Stand Aside, but he'd likely need to at least catch one more Axe for enough duration on Rush to get far enough away.

Due to Garen not having momentum from DMP or Q movespeed, dashes from Lucian, Ezreal, Corki and Tristana are more than enough.

Quinn can Vault off him and also blind him, making it harder for him to actually catch her.

Since "his combo" includes using his W Tenacity to make sure he can even get to the champions, CC reliant Xayah and Varus still have a chance. Xayah addtionally so due to her ultimate.

Ashe doesn't have enough CC to properly get away from Garen, since her stun would be far too short in duration and her slow is a rather weak effect. That's why I never listed her in the first place.

Melee´s stacking tenacity are barely affected by any CC, and cait's slow is weak in the first place, Garen just need to keep his W until he knows she´ll W and it won't affect him at all.

I´ve done things similarly on shyv and Seju.


Draven's stand aside is a knockback isnt it? It wouldn't be affect by tenacity but it's not long in the first place, and if Garen is already on him then it would be exceedingly hard to push garen of in a good direction and control axes at the same time.

Lucian and corki's dashes are short, very short.

They only help for dealing with skillshots or gaining a tiny bit of distance, it would not be enough.

Same with Ezreal for the most part.


Honestly, if i were Garen i´d just run up, E on them and save Q and W until they run. This would let me keep deadman and Q for a easy sprint-


Quinn will only get a short amount of time, with a E-Q combo she´ll get the chance to kite to the sides but she won't outrun Garen either, I´ve been there x)


Varus won't stand a chance once his ulti is down, and Xayah is toast once her E is gone as well.

Ashe post 2 items at level 9-12 will have a 40-60% slow, this is supposed to be her thing.....regrettable that it is so useless against most x)

Funny fact, if you stack tenacity as a melee her slow will actually decay away before she can fire a second short unless she has high levels and 2 attackspeed items.


Which means she never gets her passive damage off, poor Ashe.

You already mentioned "combo", and in almost all cases Garen WILL need his Q just to get onto the ADC. He can't be expected to just walk up because the ADC isn't gonna stand still and let Garen do that. Especially if they're the villain or low enough his R is an immediate threat.

The short answer is that he can't save Q without burning summoners, and at that point you have to assume the ADC have summoners and warning as well. You can't just say "well save the Q" because he needs it to get onto them for the combo in the first place. Additionally, if he does not Q the ADC they will dash away before he's striking them even once with his E due to the fact DMP won't be slowing them and they will be free to cast spells.

If Garen is going to have Tenacity without using his W, he will need to buy generic Mercury Treads, which most ADC will have matched with their own T2 boots. The ADC will also have the movespeed advantage due to Zeal items or Youmuu's active.

You were the one to mention deadmans plate first x)

And if he does get in range to E ontop of them then a small dash won't get them out, and with the speed from not burning deadman will let him sit on them and Q right after.

Is there even a marksman that builds yomus still?  Except MF going lethality that is.


And why would garen not have his W up? The only thing it does is damage reduction+tenacity which means he can just keep it until they try to CC him, no need to use it before that.

So yeah, he can just run up, do his first combo and ulti, then provided they do survive that it's just a matter of using Q again, the downtime when you have like 20% CDR and max'ed it is only like 4 seconds.

I honestly havent seen any marksman except Vayne ever beat a Garen 1v1 unless it's lategame.

You lead with "combo", indicating he used Q, E and R.
 
If he did not kill the ADC with that, the ADC mentioned have a chance to escape with their mobility skills mentioned.

You started throwing in "Well, if Lucian has Youmuu's maybe" and then tried to say Garen wouldn't use Q to lead his combo when he not only needs to lead with it, he needs it just to land anything else in his combo.

The combo i suggested in the end was to run up,keep deadman and use E, then Q-R at the end.

Then use W if they try to CC and use Q when it comes back up a moment later.

And Garen does not need to use Q if he has deadman, he can just run right up, and hardly any marksman except MF with ghostblade can hope to actually outrun him.

well her and trist.

Yeah, but now you've run yourself into the same problem as before, he won't have Q up again if his R doesn't finish off his target (because he used it right before using R).

Low cooldown or not, it's long enough that he won't be able to use it again, DMP is down as well and I think you over-estimate just how much MS DMP gives via momentum (which it honestly shouldn't, but that's a different story for a different thread). A single dash/jump is enough distance (except Vayne's Tumble) and those with movement steroids will still be getting away. Vayne, on the other hand, could possibly use her stealth tumble to set him up for being stunned while putting even more distance between them.

Additionally, his W tenacity means jack against Varus' E and Xayah's W. Varus' E is (basically) unaffected by Tenacity and Xayah's W, typically maxed second, will be up a second time before his Q and she can additionally use her ultimate as defense before he can get to her while setting up another group of feathers for W.

I didn't just toss out names here. I've played Garen myself and you will almost never be able to just run up to an ADC without Q to help you, even with DMP. They will see you and run immediately; unless you jump on them with flash and/or from Fog of War (which doesn't count for the purposes of this discussion since it's an unreliable factor).

Deadman grants 60+movespeed, it's plenty good.

Twice so if he uses black cleaver and gets the additional 20 from that.

Xayah's E is easy to dodge at longer distance's, it's only when you are next to her and she has 5+ feathers out or if you already are CC'ed that it's hard to avoid it.'

But Garen doesn't really need his W to really walk through stuff, just stacking runes+merc boots alone grants you like 59-65% already.

It's pretty absurd.

When he pops W ontop of that he basically hits like 95%. 

Varus slow area is pretty small, i often see people actually dodge it as it get's cast....Even when they are diving towards him.


And admittedly some deviation has happened, but my original statement was that a marksman that somehow barely survived getting combo´d by Garen with a silver of health will usually get caught and die right after anyway.


After all, if you don't get help within those few seconds then nothing can save you from him just walking up to you and Qíng again.

'And the only marksmen that can even hope to get away in that situation by themselves are probably Vayne and Tristana, i don't think MF can manage because her base movespeed is so low.


So if he gets ontop of them and deals that much damage it's already over basically.

How realistic or unrealistic such a scenario happening is however, a different matter x)
Did this as rumble with my shield earlier this week :P

That's a lie, no one escapes justice!!!!!
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

> [{quoted}](name=zaqat,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=js1IMnOA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-24T11:59:27.853+0000)
>
> {{item:3155}}

not if you're the villain
